comment: Easy A, the professor does not respond to emails or discussion boards!

Avoid this professor if you can, I learned nothing in this class. She is MIA... never responds to her emails or discussion board and gives assignments with unclear instructions. Furthermore, she offers no notes, PPTs, or teachings of her own. There was no direct textbook access. Dr. Dembla is simply at KSU for a paycheck.

There was 1 group project that we worked on throughout the semester that was easy. We had weekly assignments from cengage that consisted of 10 open-response questions and then a 10 question quiz and both allowed the textbook. There were 3 exams no lockdown browser. Easy class but was disorganized and prof was bad at responding to emails.

This course was a breeze. I don't know why all the reviews says she's bad, she was just fine. She responded to emails, was available for meetings, and gave overall good feedback. The course was pretty much one of those online textbook courses (kinda like one of those Mcgraw Hill courses). Group project was okay. Easy A overall. Just tedious maybe
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: She hardly responds to emails when you have questions about anything going on in the class. If she does respond, it is a copy and paste of the rubric and very demeaning. A lot of quizzes but they were quick and easy, 2 tests, and some projects that are fairly easy and will take you 5 hours or less.

She is an easy grader but BEWARE if you take her class, you will be very frustrated. She does not email back in a timely manner. She does not teach the material, so I hope you know how to do everything going in. She is the worst teacher I have ever had. You can easily get an A but be prepared to be frustrated the whole semester.

She is by far one of the worst professors I've had at KSU. She won't respond to your email for days or even weeks so if you have a question ask in the groupme. If you have something important to discuss with her good luck on getting a response. If you're the type of student who likes to communicate with your professors choose a different one.

Test are fairly difficult, and the assignments are time consuming but relatively easy. The group project is really difficult with minimum guidance making me learn how to do it my self. She knows the subject very well but the teaching style just dosnt fit me all to well.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Lecture heavy--Tough grader

comment: Does NOT reply to email. I guess if your question doesnt make sense, the polite thing to do as a person isto reply than to completely ignore. Not sure if she even cares about her students. Gotta be the worse Professor Ive ever encountered. Its very annoying; its like you have all these assignments and NO communication whatsoever. UNACCEPTABLE!!

Does NOT reply to email. I guess if your question doesnt make sense, the polite thing to do as a person isto rely than to completely ignore. Not sure if she even cares about her students. Gotta be the worse Professor Ive ever encountered. Its very annoying; its like you have all these assignments and NO communication whatsoever. UNACCEPTABLE!!

If you're a fan of meaningless lectures and exams that don't pertain to anything from those lectures this is the class for you. She is disorganized and unmotivated to teach. She hardly ever grades throughout the semester so don't hold your breath. God forbid you email her with any questions. Don't even try to follow the syllabus.

Do not take if you love your GPA. Had to self teach as her lectures had no clarity. Spent the last half of the semester working on a 4 submission group project that was not worth more than the TWO midterms we had to take on top of a final. She's a very smart person, but would not recommend her teaching anyone concepts that are crucial to a major.

Pamila Dembla is as hands off as you can get. I took her class online and it took more than 3 days for her to email me back about anything. forget wanting to see your grades until the very end of the semester because she won't grade your assignments for months. The good news is she is an incredibly easy grader on weekly assignments/discussions.
